DOC.brief_summary: The study tests Tomtherapy based Image Guided Radiation against conventional radiation techniques for it's ability to reduce long term small bowel toxicity.
DOC.brief_title: Tomotherapy vs Conventional Radiation for Adjuvant Pelvic RT in Ca Cervix
DOC.criteria: Histopathological diagnosis of carcinoma cervix with postoperative intermediate or high risk features. Age >18 years. Planned for Wertheim's hysterectomy or has already undergone Wertheim's hysterectomy OR has undergone Simple Hysterectomy with no evidence of residual nodes on MRI/PET imaging+/ confirmatory nodal biopsy. No evidence of paraaortic nodal metastasis. History of multiple previous abdominal surgeries placing patient at baseline high risk of bowel toxicity or any other medical condition with baseline bowel movement disorder. Rectal Polyps or extensive hemorrhoids.
